'''"Nanatzcayan Artistry"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Nanatzcayan Artistry" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ameyalco Waters}} after defeating {{Enemy|Swiftstep Seeker|x=2}}, {{Enemy|Swiftstep Storm Scout|x=1}}, and {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus|x=1}}.
